title: Sugar Free Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ["250g American yellow mustard (such as French's)", '10g granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (e.g., Splenda (R))', '175ml cider vinegar', '2 tablespoons chilli powder', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1/2 teaspoon soy sauce', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon liquid smoke flavouring (optional)']
